TITLE: Wealthy investors find opportunities in stock market sell-offs
SUMMARY: Wealth advisors say their clients saw the drop in stock prices as an opportunity for tax savings and estate planning.

TITLE: Dolce & Gabbana launches $100 perfume for dogs inspired by owner's poodle
SUMMARY: Dolce and Gabbana's luxury perfume for dogs — costing over $100 — has sparked concerns from some animal welfare organizations.

TITLE: India's ultra-wealthy club is booming — here's where the country's rich are investing
SUMMARY: India is expected to see the fastest growth in ultra high net worth individuals globally over the next few years, a Knight Frank report forecasts.

TITLE: Jeff Bezos' family office is making big investments in AI
SUMMARY: Bezos Expeditions has always tilted heavily toward tech. Fully 70% of the family office investments are in technology, according to FINTRX.

TITLE: UAE set to welcome even more millionaires as wealthy individuals abandon the UK
SUMMARY: "Push factors include the prospect of higher taxes under a new Labour government," one investor told CNBC.

TITLE: Where are China's ultra-rich parking their wealth amid a slowing economy?
SUMMARY: The Chinese ultra-rich population is expected to swell to 144,897 by 2028 from 98,551 in 2023, where are they parking their wealth?

TITLE: Family offices are giving top staff equity and profit shares in battle for talent
SUMMARY: Family offices are surging in size and number, and competing more directly with private equity firms and venture funds for top staff.

TITLE: Sales of $100 million homes set to double this year as trophy properties recover
SUMMARY: The comeback marks a stark contrast with the national housing market, which is still feeling the pressure of high mortgage rates and lack of supply.

TITLE: LVMH CEO Bernard Arnault says Olympics sponsorship honors the spirit of France
SUMMARY: The LVMH sponsorship is on display throughout the 2024 Paris Olympic Games, which officially kicks off on Friday.

TITLE: The ultra-wealthy just gained $49 trillion in wealth thanks to stocks
SUMMARY: The global population of ultra-high-net worth individuals increased 8% last year, according to Altrata, and much of that growth was in the U.S.

TITLE: Hugo Boss shares plunge 9% as firm cuts 2024 guidance amid slumping China demand
SUMMARY: Shares of Hugo Boss fell as much as 10% in morning trade Tuesday after the company cut its sales outlook.

TITLE: Women are set to inherit trillions of dollars in the great 'horizontal wealth transfer'
SUMMARY: There are over 43 million people in the Americas over the age of 75, with over $50 trillion in combined transferrable wealth.

TITLE: Inside a $60 million beachfront mansion with subterranean secrets and Italian flair
SUMMARY: The owner of the Mar Pietra beachfront mansion in Delray Beach, Florida, is looking to shatter a local price record with an asking price of $60 million.

TITLE: Ambani's wedding kicks off in India this weekend. Here's who will be at the star-studded event
SUMMARY: Mukesh Ambani's youngest son is set to tie the knot this weekend after months-long wedding celebrations. Here's what you need to know.

TITLE: Number of millionaires to soar globally but plunge in the UK, research finds
SUMMARY: The 2024 Global Wealth Report from UBS forecasts a continued increase in the number of millionaires, with the U.K. a notable outlier.

TITLE: The five secrets to Ferrari’s success as a luxury brand
SUMMARY: This year, Ferrari for the first time surpassed Hermès as the most valuable luxury company in the world as measured by stock multiple.

TITLE: Manhattan is now a 'buyer's market' as real estate prices fall and inventory rises
SUMMARY: The average real estate sales price in Manhattan fell 3% to just more than $2 million, according to a report from Douglas Elliman and Miller Samuel.

TITLE: Millennials are ‘very ill-prepared’ to be the richest generation in history, wealth manager says
SUMMARY: Millennials are purportedly poised to be the wealthiest generation in history, but are they ready to handle the vast inflow of money?

TITLE: Ferrari CEO says all-electric model preserves the 'emotion' of the famed supercars
SUMMARY: Ferrari is opening a new E-Building in Maranello, Italy, that will produce internal combustion engine cars alongside hybrid and all-electric models.

TITLE: The UAE is set to be the No. 1 'wealth magnet' in the world, new report shows
SUMMARY: A record-breaking 128,000 millionaires are expected to relocate in 2024, according to the Henley Private Wealth Migration Report.

TITLE: Gen X stands to gain the most wealth from the $84 trillion wealth transfer
SUMMARY: According to Wealth-X, the average age of individuals in North America set to inherit fortunes from parents worth $5 million or more is 46.1 years old.

TITLE: Millionaires are abandoning the UK in droves, new research shows
SUMMARY: A record number of millionaires is expected to leave the U.K. this year, according to a new report, with this year's election expected to exacerbate the exodus.

TITLE: Beatrice Advisors launches to serve millennial and Gen Z investors from diverse backgrounds
SUMMARY: Beatrice aims to make education and accessibility paramount since many young inheritors will be new to managing wealth amid the 'great wealth transfer.'

TITLE: Family offices are planning big investments in private companies
SUMMARY: Investing directly allows them to contribute their expertise and management advice to the portfolio companies, as well as their capital.

TITLE: The U.S. added 500,000 new millionaires last year as AI fueled markets
SUMMARY: America's millionaire population grew 7.3% in 2023 to 7.43 million people, according to a Capgemini report. Their combined fortunes grew to $26.1 trillion.

TITLE: Aston Martin gets a boost from Formula 1 and new high-performance models
SUMMARY: Aston Martin has overhauled manufacturing, shored up its financials and is now launching a fleet of new products defined by high performance.

TITLE: The 10 books the rich will be reading this summer
SUMMARY: The list includes books on effective communication, AI, Formula One, whiskey, hidden vacation spots and the art collection of Alicia Keys and Swizz Beatz.

TITLE: Palm Beach housekeepers are making $150,000 a year due to massive demand from the wealthy
SUMMARY: The mass wealth migration to Florida from New York and other high-tax states has created record demand for household staff in elite Florida enclaves.

TITLE: Family offices become prime targets for cyber hacks and ransomware
SUMMARY: With their large wealth and small staffs, family offices have become lucrative targets for hackers and cybercriminals, experts say.

TITLE: 'Quiet wealth' takes on new meaning with super-private deals for mansions, art and classic cars
SUMMARY: Last year, while combined public auction sales for Sotheby's, Christie's and Phillips fell by 19%, private sales rose.
